---
title: "Intro to Linear Programming"
---

Here are the matrices styles for the Simplex Method section of the book. Shows how to color the elements in a matric to illustrate the pivot element (row and column).

Here is the first one:

```{=tex}
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & 3 \\
\color{red}4 & \color{red}5 & \color{red}6 \\
7 & 8 & 9
\end{bmatrix}

```

And here is another one:

```{=tex}
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & \color{red}2 & 3 \\
4 & \color{red}5 & 6 \\
7 & \color{red}8 & 9
\end{bmatrix}

```
